column4: Hi, i'm recompiling kernel aided by this guide http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/CompilazioneKernel
something isn't working...  can you help me?
when typing this:  sudo dpkg -i kernel-image-2.6.17-11.deb
try to tab-complete : sudo dpkg -i linux<tab>
ok, i try and back soon
Maybe i did confusion, what dir am i supposed to do the command?
hmm actually, I think this was not the right thing or you
why do you think you need a custom kernel ?
I followed step by step all the istructions in the tutorial, but, as a newbie user, i moved between dirs whesn something went wrong... I just need to be put back in the right way :-)  please help me
tried not bothering users with dummy questions, but now i need help
I can't really help you with it, I always build my kernels with source from kernel.org, not with the Ubuntu packages
ok... could be simply a wrong dir error, can you suggest me from which one I can type the command?
maybe i need to register my nick ...
no, you'll need to be registered to send PMs
